official_title: To make long-term care insurance available to civilian Federal employees, and for other purposes.
short_title: Federal Employees Long-Term Care Insurance Act

summary.text: Federal Employees Long-Term Care Insurance Act - Directs the Office of Personnel Management to arrange for the optional conversion of a portion of a Government employee's life insurance policy to long-term care insurance.

titles.title: Federal Employees Long-Term Care Insurance Act
To make long-term care insurance available to civilian Federal employees, and for other purposes.
